name: Global Regulatory Communications
goal: Provide strategic regulatory advice, project management & communications support for regulated businesses in the EU such as pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, micro-organisms, and chemical substances.
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Draft Fertiliser product regulation
Biotechnology in agriculture
Vaccine requirements
REACH requirements
Biocides regulations
EU Standards development
